body.name: Evenflo Pivot Xplore Stroller Wagon Second Seat, Adventurer Gray
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 10 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 40 mins
features: VERSATILE MODULAR SEAT: With two kids in tow, the versatile second seat fits perfectly on the Evenflo Pivot Xplore All Terrain Stroller Wagon. It accommodates a child up to 55 lb at a secure, elevated level closer to you while still leaving plenty of room for a second rider below. Push or pull the Pivot Xplore with a flip of the handle without removing the second seat.
PROTECTION WHEN YOU NEED IT: Large canopy with UPF 50 plus sun protection, and a mesh peek a boo panel for ventilation and quick checks
MULTI POSITION RECLINE: The two position recline and adjustable footrest is comfortable for babies
SNACK & GO: The included back rider child tray with cup holder provides a snack station for the rider below while the second seat is in place
STORAGE: An easy access in seat child pocket means your child will be set for the ride ahead
SAFETY IS A PRIORITY: Five position harness with comfort covers, and a removable bumper bar. It’s a safe, durable, and rigorously tested seat that will hold up against frequent use
body.description: Meet the new, ultimate ride-share stroller, Pivot Xplore™All-Terrain Stroller Wagon. This new riding experience provides extended use by accommodating 1 or 2 kids up to 5 years old. The Pivot Xplore easily transforms from a stroller to a wagon by flipping the handle. This gives parents the ability to push as a stroller, or pull as a wagon. Get even more versatility with the toddler seat and car seat adapter(sold separately). Pile all your stuff in and ride on out!

Seat accommodates a child up to 55 lb at a secure, elevated level closer to you while still leaving plenty of room for a second rider below. Push or pull the Pivot Xplore with a flip of the handle without removing the second seat. Compatible with Pivot Xplore All-Terrain Stroller Wagons.

TWO-POSITION RECLINE ADJUSTABLE FOOTREST BACK-RIDER SNACK TRAY INCLUDED

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my infant
reviews.reviewText: I got this seat because I wanted to be able to take my 5 month old infant in the wagon with my 2.5 year old. Because my infant is not able to hold her head up yet, much less sit, I needed a safer way to take her on our strolls.I got this about a month ago now, and at first didn’t realize that it reclined (the instructions didn’t make it clear) so she was sitting awkwardly in the seat. Then after a couple of walks and feeling uneasy about how she was sitting, I figured it out by looking up instructions on YouTube. I bought those inserts you see for car seats, and boom… it was perfect. She fits snugly and safely in the seat from then on. I take it off, which is very easy to do, when putting it in the car since I drive a mid size suv (2016 Subaru Forester) and it fits in between the handle and the folded seat part of the wagon. It does take up the whole trunk, but I normally only keep it in when I’m going to the park or doing very light shopping.Overall I think it’s a good buy if you are needing to use the wagon for an infant and/or have multiple kids. With the leg part folded back, my 2.5 year old fits in the seat facing her sister with plenty of space and can pull the canopy over herself (see in picture). It’s very sturdy and haven’t noticed any issues with the constant disassembling I do (at least three to four times a week) to get it in and out of the car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to more than one child
reviews.reviewText: Have a 5 year old who loves this wagon and a newborn whom I sit in the seat. It’s great the you can adjust to sit it up or lay back. I only wish the straps had a lower position. They go from the buckle past her head

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love this!
reviews.reviewText: This was a great addition to our wagon so we could easily take both our toddler and baby to fairs, the zoo, etc. It's easy to use, easy to assemble, and easy to store in the trunk when traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great!! It has made my stroller a “double decker “ but now allows for 3 to fit! Works great with my newborn and easy to assemble onto the wagon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this cuz I’m a single mom and it makes it possible for me to push all three kids in one wagon/stroller. The only thing I’d change is I wish the seat was a tad higher up cuz my kids are tall and the seat is right in their face and the seat itself even when locked in is a bit wobbly. I feel like for the price it should be better quality but it makes my life convenient so it’s really nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this, love this stroller, fits my 2 month old perfectly. Was baby carrying him everywhere and this is perfect for our walks w my 2 year old. So easy to put together, didn’t need to even look at the instructions. Love straightforward baby gear!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect addition to the wagon
reviews.reviewText: Happy with this addition so far. Wasn’t quite sure how much room there would be behind/under the seat for the child in the wagon portion, but ended up being enough and seemed like quite ample space. We were quite surprised at the max weight rating for it which seems quite high. The two pieces are quite bulky to transport however. Will need to separate the 2 and even with the wagon portion folded, will find it difficult to fit in most cars. This top portion really doesn’t fold up much, so you sorta end up with 2 space hogs. It’s kinda like a Cadillac- it’s as big as a boat but rides like a dream and enough room to hide a body. It won’t fit in the trunk of a Malibu, but in my pickup it fits amply in the bed with the tonneau cover closed. I would recommend this if you the wagon part and are adding a child. This is nicer than dealing with 2 strollers and has room for days. But it is a larger device than some other options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best purchase ever
reviews.reviewText: This seat is amazing! You take the snack tray off to put the seat on, but this comes with a little snack tray so the kiddos down below still have a snack spot. Also the seat reclines which is super helpful for nap time! This wagon has always been my favorite stroller ever and I take it every where, so I’m super happy with the added seat for my next kiddo.
Super silla ya con dos niños

I needed a second seat for my pivot xpand and was wondering if this fits. So I just took the chance to purchase it and was glad I did. Lovely colour, it fits and click easily on the xpand model without the need of adaptors.
